name: Wall Of
description:
This Short Bullet Hell Game is all about dodging and shooting.
The longer the game goes on, the more Chaotic it get´s!

It offers 4 very diffrent Enemys and 3 unique Special Items to make up a fun experience!

Every time you get hit,  a Wall get´s created to confine you.

It has very Simple Controls (W,A,S,D, space and leftclick)
wich are also shown Ingame.

Have Fun and try to get as many Achievements as possible! (and beat the time of your friends of course :) )

I copied the Sounds and Music from others(shown ingame) and i copied half of the movement controller, and a few minor things(~3-10 line things) from other projects im working on
